official-title.#text: To treat payments by charitable organizations with respect to certain firefighters as exempt payments.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Fallen Firefighters Assistance Tax Clarification Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Payments by charitable organizations with respect to certain firefighters treated as exempt payments

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , payments made on behalf of any firefighter who died or was injured as a result of the ambush of firefighters responding to an emergency on December 24, 2012, in Webster, New York, to any family member of such firefighter or aforementioned injured firefighters by an organization described in
shall be treated as related to the purpose or function constituting the basis for such organization’s exemption under
if such payments are made in good faith using a reasonable and objective formula which is consistently applied.
shall apply only to payments made on or after December 24, 2012, and before December 31, 2013.
